name: Peripheral Nightmare
description:
Peripheral nightmare is the very first project by the indie studio AlrightGaming.net. It was a learning process for all of the members, and a lot of valuable skills were developed during the production of this game.

This is a very simple horror game about a child, P, exploring their abstract Nightmare-scape and trying to just get back to bed.

Use your favorite directional keys and spacebar for controls.
